ai-tha-ap488:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap488:2.4_0: The fruit element of the elements.
ai-tha-ap488:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap488:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap488:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūmajaka.
ai-tha-ap488:7.1_0: The sixth elements, a sixth, and a sixth part of senior monks.
